name: FixedFeeIT
description:
Fixed Fee IT was started in 1995 by Larry Gray, CEO, to fill a void between technical services companies and accountability, respect and excellence. A company built on the foundation of treating employees and clients with the utmost respect. A company judged not only on what we do, but how and why we do it.
We are constantly pushing ourselves to improve and find better and more efficient ways to help our clients achieve their goals.
